description: This file defines a jQuery plugin for creating and managing a crossword puzzle interface, including rendering the puzzle grid, handling user interactions, and checking answers.

methods.name: init
methods.description: Initializes the crossword puzzle, sets up event handlers, and builds the puzzle grid and clues.

methods.name: calcCoords
methods.description: Calculates all coordinates for puzzle entries based on starting positions and orientations.

methods.name: buildTable
methods.description: Constructs the HTML table representing the crossword grid.

methods.name: buildEntries
methods.description: Populates the grid with input fields for each puzzle entry and adds clue labels.

methods.name: checkAnswer
methods.description: Checks if the current input matches the correct answer for the active entry.
